data.message: You will never be able to please everyone.  There will always be negative people, but I for one am very thankful for FB!  It makes it possible to keep up with family and friends who are scattered all over the country!  Thank you Marc and all of the FB crew!!

replies.message: Thank you for the kind words, Becky. We appreciate you being part of our community. -Anna

Facebook ......I would LOVE to be pleased, but until you can help me get my original account back, I will not be making very positive posts.  I have been asking for help since the beginning of June.  Your links don't work and neither do your robo-responses.  I need the help of an Admin.  WHY can't I get that??
